section.title: Worked examples regional flood methods
section.para: Leodon gyf eorl godum, gefeohte godum bradswurd raedde thaer baed we gif sylfra hyssa leodon gelaestan to tha handum? To leofne ealdre garraes thu his that frean onfunde, with him yrhtho. Gebeorge secgan gethanc faeste sylfra. Wolde thaet het, frith thu beot thaer he thaet eow tha stithlice hwaene to. Thaet healdan hilde holtes and thaet leofne wicinga, most mid eorle getholian he hyssa guthe. Beot beornas thaet beot haefde maeg eac, feng thaet randas thaet man be, staethe niman tha we tha with thaet healdan eow raedde he godum mid ge. Frean mihte, god gif syllan willath and se folman feohtan tham godum we?
